messages.message: *[Need attention]* There is ask from SC as well for network policy details and so we would like to share the one which has been reviewed and approved by all engg team/services owners.  I see that @Hari’s team (doc reader), @Kerry  (flow), @sudeep /@Sabyasachi Roy (infra/core-platform) have reviewed.  Can we please get other leads as well to review this and give confirmation before we share this with customers ?  @Heymian, @lydia @peter @Theo Jungeblut @Brennan . this is the PR https://github.com/instabase/deployments/pull/732
I audited core-tasks, the core-services and model ones. they look reasonable.
Can we confirm with SC if they require network policies like Natwest or more like JPMC? JPMC is much easier to manage.
sorry, what is JPMC like type ?   This is the ticket form SC https://instabase.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/2720

@Heymian Looks like they want pod to pod policy
@alagar JPMC has list of egress/ingress port in network policy without any pod selector. They have just restricted port number that are open in namespace.
i think once we get confirmation from @lydia’s team for the services that she owns, we should be good  @sada , as we got review done from everybody else.
hey! I am just catching up here. What is the ask? What should my team review?
Should we review the spreadsheet? Or the PR?
Hey! my team just reviewed the spreadsheet and added a comment in model-training-tasks for missing services
